about_the_game:
"Being out of the ordinary is not a blessing from the gods, but a sin against them."
All recuperators in sanatorium Kepler-452b are "ABNormals" with different abilities.

Most people can't accept the differences between extraordinary individuals and themselves.
Marginalizing "the special" or trying to "normalize" the abnormal is in our human nature.
As a result, more and more recuperators are sent here.

The fortune earned from the treatment cost is spent on advanced technologies, new equipment, staff salaries, and everything else in the sanatorium. A fair exchange - both sides get what they need.

However, one doubt always remains in my mind...
None of the recuperators I've cared for have left, so why have none of their families questioned it?

〇About Main Characters〇


Carina
The manager of the second and third floors. She helps to keep the sanatorium running.
Abilities: Healing and mind-control


Marie
A well-behaved new recuperator who is somewhat timid and looks forward to going home.
Ability: Liquid void


Noel
Tells bad jokes anytime and anywhere. Friendly and easygoing, keen on bringing warmth with his personality.
Ability: Eternal chill


Voss
A bold and cheerful recuperator. Calls herself "Voss the Brave" and loves trying new things.
Ability: Solar X-ray vision


Zoey
Twin sister of Voss. Calm and reserved. Shows particular hostility toward Carina.
Ability: Lunar X-ray vision


Modi
Reliable repairman, good at fixing all sorts of things. Has an unknown past.
Ability: None


Dr. Chimaz
Director of the sanatorium. Cares about all the recuperators and wants to make the sanatorium feel like a second home for them.


Light
Type Beta-T913 medical robot. The manager of the first and fourth floors. One of the most loyal assistants in the sanatorium.

〇About This Game〇


A pixel art role-playing game with a dramatic story line.
You can explore the map, solve puzzles, and make choices.

There are some easy QTEs in the process.

[Playtime]
About 2-3 hours

[Ending]
There are 7 endings.
Get the True Ending by selecting new dialog after collecting Bad Ending 3, Bad Ending 4, Normal Ending and Happy Ending.

[Hotkeys]
Arrow keys: Move
Shift: Dash
Space/Z/Enter: Interact/Confirm
Esc/X: Show Menu/Cancel
Ctrl: Fast-forward Dialog
F1: Key config

short_description: Strange events occur at a sanatorium for those with unusual abilities. Follow clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth. What will be released when all secrets are revealed? Goodness? Or… pure ”EVIL”?
